Chapter 4 —Prayer And Soul Winning

PRAYER AN IMPORTANT PART OF SUCCESS IN SOULWINNING.—If the members of the churches would but put to work the powers of mind that they have, in well-directed efforts, in well-matured plans, they might do a hundredfold more for Christ than they are now doing. If they went forth with earnest prayer, with meekness and lowliness of heart, seeking, personally to impart to others the knowledge of salvation, the message might reach the inhabitants of the earth.—(Review and Herald, April 1, 1893).
